resources.string:
"This game is based on the puzzle blocks
swapping,which includes rearrangement of
numbers, pictures, colours and alphabets.
In this game we also include a question
after every puzzle. When you solve the 
puzzle correctly then game generates a
 question that's why the game name is G.K
-Game of Knowlegde. Answer of the given 
question is only in one word or one number
(Without any Punctuations)
OR MCQ type questions.
"

"1)	Before starting the puzzle, please
read all the instruction which is given 
with every puzzle
2)	After solving a puzzle, a Question 
is generated if you enter wrong answer 
wrong then it will indicated with Red 
otherwise Green
3)	If you don't know the answer you 
can continue by pressing "Don't Know" 
and jump to next level 
4)	There are different marks for 
questions for different levels"

"		Level			Correct		InCorrect
3X3 					+10						-05
4X4 					+20						-10
5X5 					+30						-15
6X6 					+40						-20
If you don't know ,then there is no marks 
added or deducted from your scoreboard
5)	Questions that ends with (N) that 
means enter answer in one number
otherwise in one word 
6)	Colors used in the puzzle are Blue, 
Green, Red, Yellow, Orange and Purple. 
So don't be confused 
7)	For the scoreboard click the options 
mark on the top right of the game levels 
screen 
8)	You can also share Your Scoreboard 
with you Rating of marks."
